story_ch0064_00_rival_01_02000/2401_1201: Sorry, Rockruff. I was just thinking about things.
I think I know what path I need to take, though.

I have to get strong—so strong that I won’t
lose to anyone!
(No matter what it takes...)
You know...

It might not be a bad idea to leave Pasio for a bit
to go traveling again.
Paulo? Is that you? It’s totally you, right?
Tina?!

I didn’t know you were here on Pasio! I didn’t see
you in the PML!
Sorry, the PM what? I just got here, y’know.
Oh, really? Then I can explain. So here on Pasio...
Whaaaat?! You mean I missed out on all that fun?!
No fair, Paulo! Why didn’t you bring me with you?

I mean, I don’t even really know what the
criteria is for coming to Pasio, either...
Oh well. So how’d you do in the PML, then?
Well...I did make it to the main tournament, but—
Really?! That’s amazing, Paulo!
Huh?

I mean, you just said the strongest Trainers from
around the world were all gathered here, right?

And you made it all the way to the main
tournament! That’s not something any old Trainer
can do!
You’re always so positive, Tina.

I’m so jealous! I wish I could’ve joined the
PML, too!

Lear already announced that he’s planning on
holding a second PML. If you want, you can
probably join that one.
Really? Then let’s team up and win this thing!
Tina... Sorry, but I—
Oh. [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Hm? Is that a friend of yours?

I’ll introduce you.
This is [Name:PlayerNickname ].

[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He’s" F="She’s" ] the leader of the team that won the first
PML championship.
Whoa! No kidding?!

That’s impressive! And you look about our
age, too!

[Name:PlayerNickname ], this is Tina. We grew
up together.
Nice to meet you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Oh, right. I have a favor to ask of
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
What do you mean?

Tina just got here, so she still doesn’t know much
about battling as a sync pair.

I was thinking we could have a battle to show her
what it’s all about.

Oh, thanks! If you don’t mind, that’d be
super helpful!
OK! Then, here we go!
I know all your tricks! Dodge it, Rockruff!
Wha—?!

We’re not gonna lose to you! Hang in
there, Rockruff!
Shoot.

I knew you were strong, but you’ve raised the bar
again, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

You definitely won the PML because of
that strength.

Hm? You only won thanks to the help of
your teammates?

That’s not it, though. As far as I’ve seen, your
strength was the main factor that swayed the
battle in your team’s—
Why so serious, Paulo?
Wh-what’s all this, all of a sudden?

You’ve always been like this, even when we
were traveling around, aiming to be the strongest
Trainers ever!

Remember how you’d always heal up my
Pokémon before we battled so it’d be a
fair match?

You do realize that it would’ve been easier for
you if you didn’t do that, right?
I mean...of course I’d make it fair.

And even though it looks like you have a lot on
your mind right now...
Even here on Pasio, you’re already helping me out!

I dunno... Maybe you can take a break from
all that every once in a while.
See? Even [Name:PlayerNickname ] agrees!

It’s OK to have fun and just enjoy your time
together with your Pokémon, y’know.

You don’t have to make everything so complicated!
Don’t sweat the small stuff!
I...I guess you’re right. Thanks.

Yeah! Why don’t we do more training for this PML
thing, then?
Sure, why not!

[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ll be joining the next
PML, too!

I definitely won’t let you win twice in a row, so
you’d better be ready for us!

Now that I think about it, I guess it wasn’t good
to be so fixated on winning.

This time, I’ll try to have more fun when
I’m battling!
(Is that really what I want?)
(Even though I don’t want to lose anymore?)
Uh...Paulo? You there?
Sorry. I’m fine.

Oh, I’ve got an idea! Why don’t we get something
to eat?

You two must be hungry, too! Why don’t you
show me all the good eats here on Pasio?

Be careful. Right now, some shady organizations
are getting more active on the island.

We’ll be fine! It’s not like we’re little
kids anymore!
C’mon, let’s go!
(There is one thing I’m sure of, though...)

(I can’t just stand by when villains are around!
And...I’m done with being weak.)
